title: Wind turbine maker Vestas to lay off 600 people
text:
Wind turbine maker Vestas to lay off 600 people

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 27, 2019 04:26AM ET)

© Reuters. Wind turbine maker Vestas to lay off 600 people COPENHAGEN (Reuters) - Wind turbine maker Vestas (CO: ) said on Friday it would lay off nearly 600 people as it had decided to scale down production at blade facilities in Germany and Denmark. The announcement comes one day after Vestas' main rival Siemens Gamesa (MC: ) said it would lay off up to 600 staff in Denmark as it grapples with price declines in a challenging market.
